["",{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"The following potions can be used with Potion Swords:

Extended Invisibility applies invisibility for 8 seconds to nearby players.

Instant Health II applies Absorption I for 8 seconds to nearby players."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.potion_swords.2"}]}]

["",{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"Poison II withers nearby mobs for 4 seconds and transforms skeletons into wither skeletons without loot.\n\nExtended Slowness causes nearby mobs to be unable to move for 4 seconds."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.potion_swords.3"}]}]
